alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:29PM CDT until June 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Freestone County in central Texas... South central Henderson County in central Texas... Western Anderson County in central Texas... Southeastern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Malakoff to near Richland-Chambers Reservoir to Angus, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Palestine, Teague, Fairfield, Malakoff, Kerens, Trinidad, Angus, Caney City, Navarro, Fairfield Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Fairfield Lake State Park, Montalba, Lake Halbert, Coon Creek Lake, Trinidad Lake, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Cross Roads and Oakwood. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 181 and 228. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
